DMS.title: Driver Monitoring System
DMS.det: Monitoring  the driver's facial expression and deduce the results regarding driver's attentiveness. The system should be able to gather all the information and store it in the database for future use.

AnimeHub.title: Anime Hub
AnimeHub.det: Anime Hub is a sleek, modern anime web app built with MERN, GraphQL (AniList API), Tailwind CSS, and shadCN/UI. It lets users Create accounts for personalized feed, browse trending, seasonal, and top-rated anime with rich visuals and real-time data.

Hospital.title: Hospital Managment
Hospital.det: A complete solution for all administrative and medical scheduling tasks needed in a hospital
